Dove.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a type of white soap used for washing the body and face
Dove.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a kind of small white pigeon (=bird) often used as a sign of peace
Dove.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: someone in politics who prefers peace and discussion to war
Dove.translation[3].definitions[0].defin: a politician or official who does not believe in using force or firm action when dealing with problems
